page.title: 05MALBOROUGH SCHOOL
page.content: {Malborough School}was officially opened on{2nd May, 1873.}It is therefore exactly 112 years old today. It is also my birthday today. In Malborough School there are lots of trees around.There are three teachers. There is a{swimming pool.}Malborough school has got a football pitch near by,plus a playground and netball posts.Malborough School has got a very big library.We have to serve our own dinner by two people and we have got two dinner ladies. The teachers are {Mr. Lapthorn, Mr. Boyce}and{Mrs. {Brown.}The headmaster is called Mr. Boyce.We do a lot of cooking.The school is near a shop and near {Malborough Church.}In the school we have gardens and we have got a P.E. shed plus three trophies.The school has{The Patch}which is a playing area.On The Patch are climbing frames.
